name: The Greater Evil
description:
Try and get yourself to the sacrificial altar without the forces of good converting you...

Made for Ludum Dare 43, the game is a bit light on content but is fairly functional. Let me know what you think!

Controls 

Keyboard:
A/S               : Move
W                 : Jump
Space             : Activate Altar

Controller:
Left Analog Stick : Move
Y                 : Jump
A                 : Activate Altar
